```{r}
library(leaflet)
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(plotly)


volcano_data <- read_csv(file = "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/plotly/datasets/master/volcano_db.csv")

indonesia_volcanoes <- volcano_data %>% 
  select(`Volcano Name`, Country, Region, Latitude, Longitude, Elev, Type) %>% 
  filter(Country == "Indonesia")

indonesia_volcanoes_region <- indonesia_volcanoes %>% 
  group_by(Region) %>% 
  count() %>% 
  rename(number_per_region = n) %>% 
  ungroup()

as.factor(indonesia_volcanoes_region$number_per_region)

indonesia_volcanoes %>% 
  ggplot(aes(y = Region)) +
  geom_bar()

indonesia_plot
```
